name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 15, Hangzhou, Zhejiang. Due to the lack of customers at the Hangzhou Door and Window Exhibition, a large number of exhibitors gathered together to defend their rights and demanded that the organizer refund the exhibition fees.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 17, the female content account "Shekan" was banned from following on multiple platforms

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: China announces unilateral visa exemption for Australia

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Currently, tax backtracking is happening in many places
Some netizens on social media have also reported that they have recently received calls from the tax bureau asking them to pay back taxes.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 17, Boguang Garden Community, Wuchang District, Wuhan City.
The government illegally expropriated the community's public garden and roads without a court judgment or compulsory execution order, and sent a large number of security guards with blast shields to confront the owners on the same day.
The owners said that they called the police during the period, but the police did not respond on the grounds of "government behavior."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/sr8P7yAON4

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Guangzhou plans to ban students from bringing mobile phones to primary and secondary schools
On June 15, the official website of the Guangzhou People's Congress announced the "Guangzhou Regulations on Promoting Mental Health among Primary and Secondary School Students (Draft Amendment Draft for Comments)", which specifically puts forward requirements for "preventing mobile phones and other smart terminal products from entering campuses".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Sichuan Media College notified that the school does not allow students to perform the "worship incense" opening ceremony in the school to avoid "feudal superstition" entering the campus. The "worship incense" opening ceremony is a tradition in the film and television industry.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At present, Wuping County, Longyan, Fujian Province is seriously flooded, and some residents are trapped and sent messages to Douyin for help. According to reports, from 14:00 on the 16th, heavy rainstorms suddenly fell in some areas, and the maximum rainfall in 24 hours was 372.4 mm in Yanqian Town.
Many places in the county were severely affected, and many landslides occurred in Xiaba, Zhongchi, Xiangdong, Zhongbao, and other towns, killing 4 people and leaving 2 missing.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 16, Liangshan Yi Autonomous Prefecture, Sichuan. A woman posted a video saying that the "Lugu Lake Gewu" B&B they run was demolished in May, but the government did not solve the resettlement problem. Her 19-year-old brother committed suicide by jumping off a building that night because he could not accept the incident. Before committing suicide, he posted on WeChat Moments "Everything will be fine, right?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The combined flood discharge of Changtan Reservoir and Pingyuan Youshu Reservoir in Jiaoling County caused many residents to be trapped and unable to evacuate in time, forcing them to post messages on TikTok asking for help. A local resident said, "The water level rose by 20 centimeters in 5 minutes." Another netizen from Pingyuan County revealed that a family was buried alive by a landslide.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/6x7FPug9kn

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Do you know what diplomatic immunity is?"
June 17, Beijing. Blogger "Shu Ke Bian Beta" posted a video saying that he drove out and saw a Volkswagen car with an embassy license plate parked in the middle of the road outside the community, causing a traffic jam.
During the negotiation with the other party, the woman in the car had a bad attitude and shouted, "If you take pictures of me again, I will tell you, I will report to the police. Do you know what an embassy car is? Do you know what diplomatic immunity is? Get out of here."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It was reported online that on June 17, a research and development colleague at Shopee’s Beijing office died suddenly.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, the Information Department of the General Office of the Supreme People's Procuratorate issued two documents on "walking the line" to the procuratorates across the country.
Among them, "Beware of the "walking the line" group stabbing the country and damaging our country's image" mentioned that "the smuggling group instructed the walkers to fabricate political asylum materials, seriously smearing our country's image"
"The walkers did not want to be repatriated and ended up working illegally on the streets of the United States, further damaging our international image"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the article "The 'walking' underground industry chain of smuggling needs urgent attention", it is mentioned that a three-dimensional border control system of "points, lines and surfaces" will be established, transforming from severe punishment of the smuggling link to punishment of the entire chain, and focusing on the circuitous regulation of the smuggling link.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @Terenceshen This is an old trick used by the Internet trolls. They have used it before between me and some people, including the younger generation and old democracy activists. They deliberately send Internet trolls to both sides to stir up trouble, thus causing everyone to fall into division, estrangement and mutual argument.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 5-June 16, Haikou, Hainan. The government recently started demolishing illegal shops in Haihong Building Materials City, but did not compensate the owners. The owners protested against the forced demolition, and some owners said that the shop they renovated with loans was going to be demolished before it even started business.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 8, Beijing. Huludao City Public Security Criminal Investigation Brigade policeman Qi Junwei and his family had a physical conflict with the interception personnel when they petitioned in Beijing to defend their rights.
According to Qi Junwei, he was previously attacked by a gangster with a gun and became disabled. He received a work injury certificate in 2005, but due to the error of the Municipal Medical Security Service Center, he did not enjoy medical reimbursement until 2013.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported online that a railway design institute in Shanghai issued a notice on "Guidance on Comprehensive "Tight Living""
